snippet: The legislation appears to contrast with a broader plan taking shape in the Senate.
abstract: Bipartisan group of eight House members is preparing alternative immigration legislation that will offer three distinct paths to citizenship; effort comes in shadow of broad Senate bill that focuses on single, clear path.
lead_paragraph: The legislation appears to contrast with a broader plan taking shape in the Senate.

headline.seo: House Group’s Immigration Bill Takes Shape
headline.main: House Immigration Bill Is Said to Offer 3 Paths
headline.print_headline: House Immigration Bill Is Said to Offer 3 Paths
